scripts.spellcheck: npx spellchecker ./src/shared/**/*.md --no-suggestions -q -d ./dictionary.js --plugins spell indefinite-article repeated-words syntax-mentions syntax-urls
scripts.push-test: npm run spellcheck && NODE_ENV=testing ARC_CONTRIB=yas ARC_LOCAL=yas tape 'test/**/*-test.js' | tap-spec
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run spellcheck && PORT=6666 NODE_ENV=testing SESSION_TABLE_NAME=jwe tape test/*-test.js test/**/*-test.js | tap-spec
